stakeholder_groups.name: Admin/Founder
stakeholder_groups.description: Company owner/founder with full system access and decision-making authority
needs: Complete visibility into all business operations
Real-time dashboards showing company health metrics
Ability to approve high-value transactions and sensitive changes
Access to comprehensive financial reports and analytics
Control over user permissions and system configuration
Quick access to compliance status and statutory filings
AI-assisted insights for strategic decision making
Audit trails for all critical operations
pain_points: Time spent manually tracking multiple spreadsheets and documents
Lack of real-time visibility into cash flow and finances
Difficulty ensuring statutory compliance deadlines are met
No single source of truth for employee and financial data
Manual effort in reconciling bank statements
Risk of non-compliance penalties due to missed deadlines
Difficulty scaling operations as company grows
success_criteria: 90% reduction in time spent on administrative tasks
Zero compliance deadline misses with automated reminders
Real-time visibility into all departments within 3 clicks
AI confidence score >= 95% for auto-executed transactions
Complete audit trail accessible within 5 seconds
Monthly close completed within 2 business days
All statutory reports generated automatically with 100% accuracy

stakeholder_groups.name: HR Manager
stakeholder_groups.description: Human Resources manager responsible for employee lifecycle and HR operations
needs: Centralized employee database with all documents
Streamlined onboarding workflow with task tracking
Leave management with balance tracking and approvals
Attendance and timesheet monitoring
Payroll input preparation and verification
Employee performance and project allocation tracking
Self-service portal for employee requests
Statutory compliance (PF, ESI, PT) management
pain_points: Manual tracking of employee documents across multiple folders
No automated leave balance calculations
Difficulty tracking onboarding task completion
Manual data entry for payroll inputs
Chasing employees for timesheet submissions
Risk of PF/ESI calculation errors
No visibility into document expiry dates
success_criteria: Onboarding completed in 2 days with automated checklist
Leave balance auto-calculated with 100% accuracy
95% timesheet submission rate before deadline
Zero manual data entry for standard payroll runs
All employee documents accessible within 10 seconds
PF/ESI contributions calculated automatically per statutory rules
Employee queries resolved within 24 hours via self-service

stakeholder_groups.name: Accountant
stakeholder_groups.description: Finance/Accounts team member responsible for financial operations and compliance
needs: Complete chart of accounts with proper hierarchy
Invoice generation and accounts receivable tracking
Bill processing and accounts payable management
Bank reconciliation with transaction matching
GST compliance with automated GSTR filing
TDS calculations and quarterly returns
Multi-currency support for international transactions
Financial reports (P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow)
pain_points: Manual invoice creation and tracking in spreadsheets
Time-consuming bank reconciliation process
Complex GST calculations with multiple tax types
TDS tracking across multiple vendors
Month-end close delays due to pending entries
Difficulty matching payments to invoices
Manual calculation of currency conversions
success_criteria: Invoice generation in under 2 minutes
Bank reconciliation completed 80% automatically
GST calculations 100% accurate per compliance rules
GSTR-1 and GSTR-3B auto-generated before due dates
TDS returns generated automatically with all vendor data
Month-end close within 3 business days
Currency conversions using real-time exchange rates

stakeholder_groups.name: Employee
stakeholder_groups.description: Regular employee with self-service access for personal HR and timesheet functions
needs: Self-service access to personal information and documents
Easy leave application and balance checking
Timesheet submission for project work
View payslips and tax computation
Download Form 16 and other tax documents
View assigned projects and tasks
Update personal information and bank details
View company policies and announcements
pain_points: No visibility into leave balances
Manual timesheet tracking in spreadsheets
Chasing HR for payslips and documents
No self-service for common requests
Difficulty finding company policies
No mobile-friendly access for quick updates
Lack of transparency in salary breakup
success_criteria: Leave balance visible on dashboard
Leave application submitted in under 30 seconds
Timesheet submitted in under 5 minutes
Payslips accessible within 2 clicks
Form 16 downloaded immediately
Personal info updated without HR intervention
95% of common queries answered via self-service

stakeholder_groups.name: External Chartered Accountant
stakeholder_groups.description: External CA for verification, audit, and statutory compliance review
needs: Read-only access to financial statements
Verification of GST calculations and filings
Review of TDS compliance and returns
Access to trial balance and ledger reports
Audit trail visibility for all transactions
PF/ESI compliance verification
Bank reconciliation review
Document verification for statutory filings
pain_points: Waiting for client to prepare and share reports
Incomplete or inconsistent data across systems
Manual verification of statutory calculations
No direct access to source documents
Time spent on data collection vs analysis
Difficulty tracing transaction audit trails
success_criteria: Direct portal access without client intervention
All reports exportable in standard formats (PDF, Excel)
Audit trail complete with user, timestamp, and changes
Statutory calculations auto-verified against rules
All source documents linked to transactions
Verification completed 50% faster than manual process
stakeholder_groups.access_level: Read-only access to financial and statutory data
